import sys
test=int(input())
while(test>0):
	N=int(input())
	xyz=sys.stdin.readline().split()
	#print xyz
	part=int(xyz[2])+10*int(xyz[1])+100*int(xyz[0])
	#print part
	flag='false'
	temp=0
	i=9
	while(i>0 and flag=='false'):
		j=9
		while(j>=0 and flag=='false'):
			temp=i*10000+part*10+j
			if(temp%N==0):	
				flag='true'
			j-=1
		i-=1
	if(i!=0):
		print temp/10000, temp%10, temp/N
	else:
		print '0'
	test-=1
